description: Try our easy to follow Zucchini & Sweet Potato Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Zucchini & Sweet Potato Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat. Using a 1/4 cup measure, drop batter into oil and flatten slightly. Fry for about 2 mins each side until golden. Remove to a plate lined with paper towel and keep warm. Continue with remaining mixture. Serve fritters with tzatziki.
